SEARCH
Package antcolony.entities

Class Ant

java.lang.Object
antcolony.entities.Ant
public class Ant extends Object
Represents an autonomous agent (ant) in the simulation.

The ant possesses a finite state machine (Search, Return, Wander), manages its own energy, and interacts with the environment through pheromones and food detection.

  • Constructor Details

    • Ant

      public Ant(processing.core.PApplet p, AntColonySimulation sim, float x, float y, int colId)
      Ant Constructor.
      Parameters:
      p - Reference to the PApplet (for randomness functions).
      sim - Reference to the main simulation (for config access).
      x - Initial X position.
      y - Initial Y position.
      colId - ID of the colony it belongs to.

  • Method Details

    • isDead

      public boolean isDead()
      Checks if the ant should be removed from the simulation.
      Returns:
      true if it died of hunger or old age.

    • run

      public void run(processing.core.PApplet p, AntColonySimulation sim)
      Updates the main ant logic (AI, Physics, and Metabolism).
      Parameters:
      p - Reference to the PApplet.
      sim - Reference to the simulation.

    • returnHome

      private void returnHome(processing.core.PApplet p, AntColonySimulation sim)
      Logic to return home by following "Home" pheromones.

    • followPheromones

      private Ant.AntState followPheromones(processing.core.PApplet p, AntColonySimulation sim, int channelToFollow)
      Generic logic to follow a pheromone channel.
      Parameters:
      channelToFollow - The channel to follow (Food or Home).
      Returns:
      The suggested next state (SEARCHING or WANDERING if lost).

    • smellFood

      private boolean smellFood(processing.core.PApplet p, AntColonySimulation sim)
      Checks if there is food (FallingLeaf) within the vision radius. If so, moves towards the nearest one.
      Returns:
      true if food was found and is being pursued.

    • interact

      private void interact(processing.core.PApplet p, AntColonySimulation sim)
      Manages physical interactions: picking up food, dropping food at the queen, and depositing pheromones on the ground.

    • display

      public void display(processing.core.PApplet p)
      Draws the ant on the screen.
      Parameters:
      p - Reference to the PApplet.
